Application no. 20005339 HAX, an Urban Development Action Area Project, located in Community Board 3, Council District no. 16, Borough of the Bronx.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development and pursuant to §696 of the General Municipal Law for a real property tax exemption.
